METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the user to the Edit Appointment page when they click the "Edit Appointment" button and populates the data from the selected appointment into the input fields

METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the user to the Reports Page when the click the "Reports" button
OnClickSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.addAppointmentController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted values, performs time conversions and logic checks that ensure the inputted times are within business hours and do not overlap with another appointment for the same customer, and calls the addAppointment database method that inserts the new appointment values into the database
OnClickSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.addCustomerController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted information, performs time formatting and conversions, inputs the data into the database, and returns the user to the Customer Page.
OnClickSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.editAppointmentController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method gathers all of the inputted values, performs time conversions and logic checks that ensure the inputted times are within business hours and do not overlap with another appointment for the same customer, and calls the editAppointment database method that updates the selected appointment values into the database

OnLoginButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.loginPageController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method collects the inputted userName and password, passes it into the loginValidation method in my User model, and returns a boolean based on if the userName password combo exists in the database.
OnLogoutButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.mainScreenController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method takes the user to the Login Page when the click the "Log Out" button
OnMonthToggleClick() - Method in class sample.view_controller.appointmentPageController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method populates the table with appointments within a month from the customers current time when the Month radio button is clicked.
OnNextButtonClick() - Method in class sample.view_controller.appointmentPageController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method works in conjunction with the Week and Month radio buttons and populates the table with appointments one month or week in the future when the user clicks the "Next" button.
OnPreviousButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class sample.view_controller.appointmentPageController
METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method works in conjunction with the Week and Month radio buttons and populates the table with appointments one month or week in the past (relative to the start and end time markers) when the user clicks the "Previous" button.

METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method listens for a selection in the Country ComboBox, then limits the states/provinces that populate into the State ComboBox by using the getStateFromCountryName method in my FirstLevelDivisions model

METHOD DESCRIPTION: This method listens for a selection in the Country ComboBox, then limits the states/provinces that populate into the State ComboBox by using the getStateFromCountryName method in my FirstLevelDivisions model
